tasks.title: CoinGlass Collector — Core Data Collection
tasks.description: Create CoinGlass cron collector on rsnest. Collects OI overview (top 30 coins), funding rates, options OI, fear & greed index. Outputs to /data/coinglass/*.json. Schedule: every 15 min.

tasks.title: CoinGlass Cron Registration + Env Setup
tasks.description: Register coinglass_collector in rsnest cron system. Add COINGLASS_API_KEY to docker env. Verify data collection runs successfully.

tasks.title: Meridian Crypto API Router
tasks.description: Create /api/crypto/* endpoints: overview, derivatives, etf, fear-greed. Read from /app/data/coinglass/*.json bind mount. Add volume mount in docker-compose.yml. Register router.

tasks.title: Sidebar Navigation Restructure
tasks.description: Reorganize sidebar into 4 sections: Smart Money, Market Pulse, Crypto, Research. Add Crypto sub-items. No breaking changes to existing routes.

tasks.title: Crypto Overview Page (/crypto)
tasks.description: Main crypto dashboard page. KPI bar (BTC, ETH, F&G, Total OI), Top 20 coins OI table, Smart Money crypto signals (migrated from /crypto-signals), BTC/ETH ETF flow summary cards.

tasks.title: Derivatives Page (/crypto/derivatives)
tasks.description: Pill-tabbed page: Open Interest tab (exchange breakdown table + bar chart), Funding Rates tab (all exchanges, color-coded), Options tab (exchange OI). CoinGlass data density + Stocknear cleanliness.

tasks.title: Crypto ETF Page (/crypto/etf)
tasks.description: Dedicated BTC/ETH ETF flows page. Extract from existing fund-flows + crypto-signals data. More detail than summary cards. Reuse existing etfFlows API.

tasks.title: Redirect /crypto-signals → /crypto
tasks.description: Add server-side redirect from /crypto-signals to /crypto. Update internal links. Keep old route working via 301.

tasks.title: Deploy + Integration Test
tasks.description: Build and deploy both rsnest (collector) and meridian (API + frontend). Verify all pages render, data flows correctly, no SSR errors. Update CHANGELOG.md.
